name: Chittagong
description: Chittagong, a port city on the Bay of Bengal, is known for its rich culture, stunning beaches, and diverse attractions. From the serene hill tracts to bustling markets, Chittagong offers a unique experience.

reviews.comment: Absolutely breathtaking! The beach is perfect for a peaceful escape.
A bit crowded, but the natural beauty makes up for it.
Great spot for an evening stroll with a cool breeze.
Perfect for sunset views, but the beach is smaller.
A hidden gem with stunning beaches and crystal-clear water. Perfect for snorkeling.
The island is beautiful, but the transportation to get there can be challenging.

activities.name: Cox's Bazar Beach
activities.description: The longest unbroken sea beach in the world, stretching over 120 kilometers. Known for its golden sands and tranquil atmosphere.

activities.name: Patenga Beach
activities.description: A popular beach near the port of Chittagong, offering a scenic view of ships and a lively atmosphere.

activities.name: Foy's Lake
activities.description: A picturesque lake with boat rides, located in the hills, ideal for a peaceful day out.

activities.name: Kaptai Lake
activities.description: A large man-made lake surrounded by hills, famous for boating and scenic views. It is located in the Kaptai National Park area.

activities.name: Rangamati
activities.description: A hill district known for its lush green landscape, tribal culture, and the beautiful Kaptai Lake.

activities.name: Saint Martin Island
activities.description: A tropical paradise in the Bay of Bengal, famous for its coral reefs, crystal-clear waters, and white sandy beaches.

reviews.comment: Inspiring and historic! The views from the pedestal are stunning.
A bit crowded, but worth it for the experience.
An incredible collection of art and history. You could spend an entire day here.
Amazing exhibits, but the museum is huge—plan your visit!

activities.name: Statue of Liberty
activities.description: An iconic symbol of freedom, located on Liberty Island. A must-visit landmark in New York City.
activities.entryFee: Ferry ticket: $24 (includes access to the island and pedestal)

activities.name: Central Park
activities.description: A massive urban park in the heart of Manhattan, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

activities.name: Empire State Building
activities.description: A world-famous skyscraper with breathtaking views of NYC from the observation deck.

activities.name: Brooklyn Bridge
activities.description: A historic suspension bridge offering stunning views of Manhattan and Brooklyn.

activities.name: The Metropolitan Museum of Art
activities.description: One of the largest and most prestigious art museums in the world, featuring exhibits from various cultures and time periods.
activities.entryFee: $30 for adults (suggested donation for NY residents)

bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to November

reviews.comment: The sparkling lights at night are magical. Worth every penny!
The views from the top are incredible, but expect long lines.
The avenue is vibrant and lively, and the view from the Arc is spectacular.
A wonderful mix of history and modern luxury, but it can get pricey.

activities.name: Eiffel Tower
activities.description: An architectural marvel. Climb to the top for breathtaking views of Paris.

activities.name: Louvre Museum
activities.description: The world's largest art museum and a historic monument in Paris, home to the Mona Lisa and countless masterpieces.

activities.name: Notre-Dame Cathedral
activities.description: A masterpiece of French Gothic architecture, known for its stunning facade and historic significance.

activities.name: Montmartre and Sacré-Cœur
activities.description: A charming neighborhood known for its artistic history and the stunning Sacré-Cœur Basilica with panoramic views of Paris.

activities.name: Champs-Élysées and Arc de Triomphe
activities.description: A bustling avenue with high-end shops leading to the iconic Arc de Triomphe, offering a beautiful view from the top.

bestTimeToVisit: April to June, September to October

name: Tokyo
description: Experience the perfect blend of tradition and technology in Japan's capital. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Aliquid dolores et numquam animi quod eveniet recusandae vel! Quos nam sapiente deleniti sit accusantium suscipit sequi eveniet! Quo accusamus esse sed

reviews.comment: The lights and movement are surreal.
Great vibe, but overwhelming during rush hours.
A paradise for anime and tech enthusiasts. Endless shops and arcades!
Amazing variety, but some stores are overwhelming.

activities.name: Shibuya Crossing
activities.description: The world's busiest pedestrian crossing, a symbol of Tokyo's energy.

activities.name: Tokyo Skytree
activities.description: A modern marvel and one of the world's tallest towers, offering stunning views of Tokyo.

activities.name: Senso-ji Temple
activities.description: Tokyo's oldest temple, located in Asakusa, famous for its beautiful architecture and traditional atmosphere.

activities.name: Tsukiji Outer Market
activities.description: A vibrant market offering fresh seafood, delicious street food, and a taste of Tokyo's culinary culture.

activities.name: Meiji Shrine
activities.description: A serene Shinto shrine located in a forested area of Tokyo, dedicated to Emperor Meiji and Empress Shoken.

activities.name: Akihabara
activities.description: A hub for electronics, anime, and otaku culture, offering a unique glimpse into modern Japanese pop culture.

bestTimeToVisit: March to May, October to November

reviews.comment: Fascinating history and the Crown Jewels are a must-see!
A great experience, but can get crowded.
The palace is stunning, and the Changing of the Guard is a must-see.
A beautiful place, but better if you catch the guard ceremony.

activities.name: Tower of London
activities.description: A historic castle and UNESCO World Heritage Site, home to the Crown Jewels and centuries of British history.

activities.name: London Eye
activities.description: A giant Ferris wheel on the South Bank of the River Thames, offering breathtaking views of London.

activities.name: British Museum
activities.description: One of the world's greatest museums, housing a vast collection of art and artifacts from across the globe.

activities.name: Buckingham Palace
activities.description: The official residence of the British monarch, famous for its Changing of the Guard ceremony.

reviews.comment: The view from the top is absolutely mesmerizing, especially at sunset.
An unforgettable experience, but the tickets are expensive.
Stunning views and a luxurious experience. A must-visit!
Beautiful, but some areas are restricted to hotel guests.

activities.name: Burj Khalifa
activities.description: The tallest building in the world, offering panoramic views of Dubai from its observation decks.

activities.name: Dubai Mall
activities.description: One of the largest malls in the world, featuring luxury shopping, dining, and attractions like the Dubai Aquarium.

activities.name: Desert Safari
activities.description: A thrilling experience in the Dubai desert with dune bashing, camel rides, and cultural performances.

activities.name: Palm Jumeirah
activities.description: A man-made island in the shape of a palm tree, home to luxury hotels, beaches, and attractions like Atlantis, The Palm.
